creditline: Gift of Willard and Elizabeth Clark
description: male figure sitting cross-legged rests his chin in his left hand and is surrounded by fine women and several rickshaws; the man wears a tall black hat and the women have hair of various colors that flow all the way to the ground; three gold hilltops at upper right
inscription:
Inscription and Seal

Japanese characters in black ink, ULQ
title: Hikaru Genji
